title: The Complete Secrets Series
description: Now you can get the COMPLETE 6-book Secrets series in a single box set! Suspense, kink, and a whole lotta hot! If you love Domination and submission, you're gonna want this box set in your collection!The box set Secrets of SubmissionSecrets of DesireSecrets of RedemptionHis to ProtectSecrets of BetrayalA Secret Christmas
author: L.K. Shaw
